title: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions do not work
description: When creating a report and using the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions in the chart filters, the expected results are not being generated.
OB: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions are not filtering the chart data correctly based on the specified conditions. As a result, the chart is not displaying the top or bottom values as expected.
EB: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions should accurately filter the chart data based on the specified conditions, resulting in the correct display of the top or bottom values in the chart.
SR: To resolve this issue, the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions need to be fixed so that they correctly filter the chart data based on the specified conditions.
